TopicTitle: Missing Unknown Objects in Tracking Station

Articles.Content: I'm waiting for a Class D asteroid for a contract.  My tracking station says I have 7 unknown objects (there is a "7" under the icon".  I can see only 3 on the map.  Am I missing something?
Zoom out and scroll around? They could be over the poles and out of the usual lines of sight.
I think that you can enable the tracking of unknown objects in the tracking station. "?"

Have you been to Dres? There are asteroids at Dres that you won't see until you focus the map on Dres.

Part recovery contracts also show up as Unknown Objects -- so theoretically you might have some of those.

Otherwise, Vanamonde is right -- if you scroll around you should see them.
I saw that some didn't come up until I focused on Kerbal.  I'll check Dres....
